venue.address_1: Charge Pond Road & Fearing Pond Road
venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest- Charge pond gate

item.description:
A tour of the great southeastern section of the park will pass by beautiful white sand beaches of Abner's Pond and New Grassy Pond.

Estimate is 5 to 6 miles and two to three hours, depending on the group.

Sunday is a no-hunting day in Massachusetts, so we won't have to worry about that. Please bring water and snacks appropriate to the length of this walk.  Severe weather will cancel.

We will meet by the gate to the Charge Pond camping area.  It is easy to find by following the numerous signs in the park directing you to "Charge Pond". (The gate will be closed at this time of year.)

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Friends' First Sunday hike for November
